title: Waco Mammoth National Monument: Safety
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Safety            Safety       The majority of your tour (20-30 minutes) will take place in the climate controlled Dig Shelter. However, the first 10-15 minutes of your guided tour will take place outdoors. Summer in Texas can be hot. Drink plenty of water, wear a hat and sunscreen, and take it easy.   While inside the Dig Shelter, please no climbing or sitting on the rails of the elevated walkway.    In the case of hazardous weather please call before your visit.
